thread.title: Robo Adviser Wealthfront Cuts a Fee to Appease Angry Investors

author: Anne Tergesen
title: Robo Adviser Wealthfront Cuts a Fee to Appease Angry Investors
text:
Robo advisory firm Wealthfront Inc. said it would cut the fee on a new investment product that led some clients and consumer advocates to question its commitment to a low-cost model.
The retreat occurred as Wealthfront and other startups that pioneered automated investment advice are trying to diversify their offerings in the face of heightened competition from more established financial companies. Those rivals are rolling out similar services of their own.
...
